actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_MTD as (
select channel_display_name AS channel,
	count(DISTINCT(video_title)) as count_site,
SUM(views) as MTD
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  AND date <= '{{moment()}}':: date
	AND time_published >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  AND time_published <= '{{moment()}}':: date
group by channel
),
CTE_lastMonth as (
select channel_display_name AS channel,
SUM(views) as MTD_last_Month
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date >= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  AND date <= date_trunc('month', now())::date - 1
	AND time_published >= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  AND time_published <= date_trunc('month', now())::date - 1
group by channel
),
CTE_lastYear as (
select channel_display_name AS channel,
SUM(views) as MTD_last_year
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date >= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}':: date
  AND date <= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}':: date
	AND time_published >= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}':: date
  AND time_published <= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}':: date
group by channel
)
SELECT * FROM(
select coalesce(CTE_MTD.channel,CTE_lastMonth.channel,CTE_lastYear.channel) as channel,
case when count_site is null then 0 else count_site end as count_site,
case when mtd is null then 0 else mtd end as mtd,
case when round(((mtd::numeric-mtd_last_month::numeric)/mtd_last_month::numeric)*100,2) is null then cast(0 as varchar) else concat(round(((mtd::numeric-mtd_last_month::numeric)/mtd_last_month::numeric)*100,2), '%') end as vs_last_month,
case when round(((mtd::numeric-mtd_last_year::numeric)/mtd_last_year::numeric)*100,2) is null then cast(0 as varchar) else concat(round(((mtd::numeric-mtd_last_year::numeric)/mtd_last_year::numeric)*100,2), '%') end as vs_last_year

from CTE_MTD FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth on CTE_MTD.channel= CTE_lastMonth.channel 
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear on CTE_lastMonth.channel=CTE_lastYear.channel
ORDER BY CTE_MTD.channel
) AS T
UNION ALL
select 'Total',sum(count_site),sum(mtd),concat(ROUND((((sum(mtd)-sum(mtd_last_month))/sum(mtd_last_month))*100),2),'%'),concat(ROUND((((sum(mtd)-sum(mtd_last_year))/sum(mtd_last_year))*100),2),'%')
from CTE_MTD FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth on CTE_MTD.channel= CTE_lastMonth.channel 
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear on CTE_lastMonth.channel=CTE_lastYear.channel;
